## BlockPolledSfStablecoinStore class

Ethers-based [SfStablecoinStore](./stablecoin-lib-base.sfstablecoinstore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledSfStablecoinStore extends SfStablecoinStore<BlockPolledSfStablecoinStoreExtraState> 
```
